job.title: Product Researcher
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong><strong><u>Position Details:<br><br></u></strong><strong>Role: </strong>Product Researcher<br><br><strong>Location: </strong>Mason, OH<br><br><strong>Duration:</strong> 6 Months<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Past Products Researcher experience at the Researcher/Associate Scientist level</li><li>Executes technical tasks and methods to meet day-to-day project needs</li><li>Performs a wide variety of lab methods and hands-on experimentation</li><li>Helps enable product test placements (either through systems entry or gathering the info for others to enter)</li><li>Helps develop claims and demos with the products research lead<br></li></ul><em>Should you have any questions, feel free to call me at (973)-494-8185 or email your resume at nagraj.ganaparpu@collabera.com.<br><br></em>Job Requirements<br><br>Word, research, SAN, Apple<br><br>Job Code: 50170917
